DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine wether the combined measurement of the soluble form of TREM-1, PCT and the determination of neutrophils CD64 expression could diagnose sepsis in critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: Combined Determination of sTREM-1, PCT and CD64 in Diagnosing Sepsis
DOC.criteria: all consecutive patients admitted into the ICU absence of social protection
